page.title: 16Home for the Elderly Onecote
page.content: The Peak Park Residential Home for the Elderly is housed in the old vicarage at the edge of the village of Onecote. The Home offers long- and short-term accommodation with personal care and attention 24 hours a day. There is an intercom in all bedrooms and an emergency call system in all bathrooms and toilets. There is also a stair-lift to the first floor. The home opened around October 1984 and can cater for 10 residents. At the moment these are all ladies. They have single or shared accommodation. A hairdresser, chiropodist and a physiotherapist visit regularly and there are library and dry cleaning services available. There is a garden in which the residents can relax and visitors are welcome at any reasonable time.
